title: Championship Jewels?
body: I have already made the icon so what can i use them for now?

replies.body: You can upgrade the new team icons to tier 3 using the jewels, and if you finished one you can do another.  If not, I don't have any information right now on what they could be used for after the event.  Any details would be provided on our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page.  Have fun!
